website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for parents wanting a sturdy bed for children who like to play hard.
pros: Metal frame will keep this bed solid for years
We love how dual access ladders built right into the frame allow some versatility in terms of positioning the bed around the room
Lots of space underneath for furniture
cons: Can be a task to put together out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, only one negative.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bed, but it took forever to put together. My son loves it. I love that we can put a full bed underneath it too. One negative is that the metal ladder to climb up on top hurts your feet - the ladder rings aren’t wide enough maybe? The price is amazing though, especially when you pick up one of the Zinus mattresses from amazon to go with it. Can’t get any more affordable. My preteen son loves this in his room.
customer_reviews.author: rachel anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed for my daughter to use, so I could put a bed under hers. It was fairly simple to put together. The kit came with all of the tools needed and each piece was labeled with a letter that matched the instructions. Its been up for over a month now and held up perfectly. We did anchor it to the wall just for more security. This was a great purchase. Low price for a high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: notasoccermom

customer_reviews.title: Narrow ladder
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these, one for a 13 year old, the other for a 20 year old. It's a little shaky for my 20yo but doesn't feel like it's going to break or fall. The ladder is NARROW and the bars WILL hurt your feet! The biggest issue is the narrowness of the ladder. My 20 yo probably weighs about 180lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for a smaller room! Excellent space saver!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this purchase! My daughter loves her new bed. My husband assembled the entire thing by himself in about 2.5 hours. It's nice and sturdy (I've even climbed up), and it's nice and tall to allow for a desk, chair, or other things under the loft. I also love that the safety railing goes all the way around (except for the opening for the ladder). I feel very comfortable with her sleeping up there because of that. It does require a mattress no thicker than 6" in order for the safety railing to be effective. We will recommend this bed to anyone looking for one!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I’m a single mom of 4 and have 2 kids in each room. These beds were purchased in hopes they would have a bit more space for each of their sides. SUCCESS! Only complaint from me is it’s a little shaky even after making sure all bolts were properly tight enough but it’s still sturdy enough that it really doesn’t concern me. I may try adding washers to see if that will help. Only complaint from kids is the ladder hurts their feet climbing up. I bought some pool noodles from the dollar store and let them pick out their own duct tape and problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - 2 Person Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year-old and she loves it! The bed is sturdy and looks great. It is easy to assemble in the sense that there are clear instructions, items are clearly marked, and no additional tools are required. However, this is a heavy, tall bed and it does require two people to assemble. I'm a single mom with lots of experience assembling large heavy pieces of furniture alone - but this is not one of them. It's not a drawback to the product, just something I wish I would have known to expect so I could have planned ahead for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his bed! He has a lot more space in his room now. He is really enjoying it. If anyone is curious he's about 5'2" tall almost a teenager and this bed was perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: passion4orange

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Option to save space
customer_reviews.text: We placed this loft bed atop a queen bed and have appreciated the space savings it provides. It is exactly what we needed at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey H.

customer_reviews.title: A little shaky, but overall good
customer_reviews.text: You for sure need two people to build it. It is up high and she likes it. The ladder rungs were uncomfortable on her feet so we put on pool noodles and then pipe insulation when the noodles started to crack. It is a little shaky. It took her some getting used to to climb up. Overall we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together! It is sturdy and completely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: nice beds, my girls love them. they took about an hour, each, for my husband and I to assemble. overall, pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: A little wobbly!?
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the bed (we bought two for a shared bedroom). So much space underneath. And they look nice. My only concern is that they’re a tad wobbly when you push/pull on it. Is this normal? Safe? We have the twin size. Someone mentioned bolting it to the wall for added security, which we may consider.
customer_reviews.author: Erin E. Bertoli

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy metal frame loft
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy metal frame loft. My son loves it. It was a big difficult to maneuver in a small room. We decided we needed to add foam to the ladder rungs since the bare rungs were uncomfortable on bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to assemble with cheap bolts that stripped
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a NIGHTMARE to assemble. The bolts stripped when I attempted to make them snug. After we moved, I had to cut the bolts and purchase replacement bolts from the hardware store in order to re assemble the bed again. Even before the move, the bed was wobbly under my 14 yo son’s weight. I would not purchase this bed again
customer_reviews.author: Chonkypot

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy this bed was to put together. I didn’t like the size of the cross bars that hold the mattress. We bought this bed for my teenage daughter to give her more space in her small bedroom. Success, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Deveau

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I really like how sturdy this bed is. It was super easy to put together. There is lots of room under this bed and it has good head clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed for my 12 year old daughter. Sturdy and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: My step son loves it. It’s tall! Not for any kid over 12 , get a lower, more stable bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The bed is easy to put together. It does wobble a little, but my son doesn't mind and I feel it is safe.
customer_reviews.author: KB4D

customer_reviews.title: No Hardware!
customer_reviews.text: I received no hardware for the bed. The box was very damaged but the frame is fine. I'm very disappointed with this purchase. The hardware will take 4-6 days to get here. I couldnt get them any sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great except...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with it is the little pins that go under the cross bars popped out under weight and movement, but they aren't very necessary to the bed itself
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the silver color, it doesnt look like a metal frame. It took like an 1hr to built with proper tools. It is not that sturdy but it doesnt feel as if its going to fall down.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Barrera

customer_reviews.title: I was able to build them myself but would have been easier with 2 people.
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They are a Christmas gift for my grandsons ages 9 and 6.
customer_reviews.author: lisa adams

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty high up.
customer_reviews.text: The steps are to narrow. My daughter complains about them hurting her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Good fitting of bolts and screws. I did not like the stickers helping assembly and big warning labels. People should use common sense.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney_McKay

product_meta.title: Your Zone.. Metal loft Twin Bed: Multiple Colors (Twin, Silver)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
